dict.acceptation: [关系代词，意义相当于 who…not, which…not]；

sent.orig: But I have refined everything away by this time—anger, indignation, scorn itself.Nothing left but disgust.
sent.trans: 到这时，我一切不平都没有了——发火，愤慨，嘲笑本身。什么都没了，只有厌恶。

sent.orig: Have grandiose aims but puny abilities,great ambition but little talent.
He's only staying three days, but he arrived with everything but the kitchen sink.
sent.trans: 他只住三天，可是他把一切杂七杂八的东西都带来了。

sent.orig: She said nothing but sat there staring blankly.; She said nothing but sat there as if in a trance.
sent.trans: 她话也不说，坐在那里发呆。
